name: The Tumbling Tower
description:
A fun approach to a platformer-type game submitted for my 3D Game Dev final. Use the left joystick to "move your character." You can also use LT/RT* to shrink and grow your character respectively. Wanna get into tight spaces? Shrink! Wanna stop yourself from getting into tight spaces? Grow!

*A controller (preferably Xbox 360/Xbox One) is required to play.
